name: Dungeon Crawler Space Explorer
description:
Description:

Dungeon Crawler Space Explorer is a rogue-like game set in space, where you play as a human boarding hostile ships, murdering fish-kin.

Key Features:

  • -Unique pixel art style
  • -Challenging gameplay
  • -Oblique view

Release Date: 26/06/2015

Platform: Windows PC

Price: FREE

Contact info: soulbearstudios@gmail.com
